meaningMnemonic: Connect a bunch of things <kanji>lay</kanji>ing in a <kanji>line</kanji>. Something's happening here. You can't put your finger on it, but you're pretty sure this is <vocabulary>foreshadowing</vocabulary> for something else.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
